/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. In the distance, buildings rise, their silhouettes forming a contrasting backdrop to the natural elements in the foreground.
